segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 47
segments.en: Linked Discourses 47

segments.pli: 3. Sīlaṭṭhitivagga
segments.en: 3. Ethics and Duration

segments.pli: 22. Ciraṭṭhitisutta
segments.en: 22. Long Lasting

segments.pli: Taṃyeva nidānaṃ.
segments.en: The same setting.

segments.pli: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā bhaddo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
“ko nu kho, āvuso ānanda, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti?
segments.en: “What is the cause, Reverend Ānanda, what is the reason why the true teaching does not last long after the final extinguishment of the Realized One?

segments.pli: Ko panāvuso ānanda, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti?
segments.en: What is the cause, what is the reason why the true teaching does last long after the final extinguishment of the Realized One?”

segments.pli: “Sādhu sādhu, āvuso bhadda.
segments.en: “Good, good, Reverend Bhadda!

segments.pli: Bhaddako kho te, āvuso bhadda, ummaṅgo, bhaddakaṃ paṭibhānaṃ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
segments.en: Your approach and articulation are excellent, and it’s a good question.

segments.pli: Evañhi tvaṃ, āvuso bhadda, pucchasi:
segments.en: For you asked:

segments.pli: ‘ko nu kho, āvuso ānanda, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti?
segments.en: ‘What is the cause, Reverend Ānanda, what is the reason why the true teaching does not last long after the final extinguishment of the Realized One?

segments.pli: Ko panāvuso ānanda, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī’”ti?
segments.en: What is the cause, what is the reason why the true teaching does last long after the final extinguishment of the Realized One?’”

segments.pli: “Evamāvuso”ti.
segments.en: “Yes, reverend.”

segments.pli: “Catunnaṃ kho, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānānaṃ abhāvitattā abahulīkatattā tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.
segments.en: “It’s because of not developing and cultivating the four kinds of mindfulness meditation that the true teaching doesn’t last long after the final extinguishment of the Realized One.

segments.pli: Catunnañca kho, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.
segments.en: It’s because of developing and cultivating the four kinds of mindfulness meditation that the true teaching does last long after the final extinguishment of the Realized One.

segments.pli: Katamesaṃ catunnaṃ?
segments.en: What four?

segments.pli: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ;
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant meditates by observing an aspect of the body—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.

segments.pli: vedanāsu … pe …
segments.en: They meditate observing an aspect of feelings …

segments.pli: citte … pe …
segments.en: mind …

segments.pli: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
segments.en: principles—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.

segments.pli: Imesaṃ kho, āvuso, catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ abhāvitattā abahulīkatattā tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.
segments.en: It’s because of not developing and cultivating these four kinds of mindfulness meditation that the true teaching doesn’t last long after the final extinguishment of the Realized One.

segments.pli: Imesañca kho, āvuso, catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti.
segments.en: It’s because of developing and cultivating these four kinds of mindfulness meditation that the true teaching does last long after the final extinguishment of the Realized One.”

segments.pli: Dutiyaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: Venerable Bhadda asks Ānanda about the conditions under which the true teaching lasts long or does not last long after the Buddha’s passing. Ānanda says it depends on whether the four kinds of mindfulness meditation are practiced.
